ygData.messageBody:
Ok, i already sent this message once and nobody responded...Im going to
send it one more time in the hopes that someone will have information to
add to my list..

I am only a Level 16 monk so I do not have very many rare spoilers for
you guys. However, I
have a few odds and ends that I have picked up in my travels. Some of
this stuff is what I have heard, so
take it as you will.

There is a glowing torch found on a rare spawn in Lavastorm...It gives 4
AC, adds +5 charisma, and can
be used as a lighting source when held in your hand.

After receiving the Squad Ring from the quest in Riverdale, you can use
it to kill Nillipus fairly easily. All
you have to do is lure Nillipus into the cleric's guide, where the ring
can be recharged, and then use the ring
when you are low on health. You can then recharge the ring at one on
the NPC's. I do not have the squad
ring yet, so i can not verify that this works. I would appreciate it if
someone would tell me how to recharge
the ring?

When talking to NPC's, they give keywords in brackets. To activate
these keywords you have to ask a
question using the keyword. Usually, a simple question such as What
[keyword]? will do the trick.
However, when the keyword is a person, then it requires a Who
[keyword]? I know this sounds pretty
simple, but it took me forever to figure out. :)

There are a pair of Shiny Silk Gloves which are found on the Queen
Spider in Lesser Faydark, i forget stats
but I believe they are magical. It would take about a level 16 group to
get them.

Ok, that about ends my knowledge...know, i have a request for a few
spoilers of my own
Most of these deal with packs or bags which reduce the weight of things
put inside...
For all of these, I would love to have information on:
% of weight reduction
where it is found
what level to get it
how much do they sell for

Shralok Pack- I know it comes from Highhold Pass, thats it

Bag of Sewn Evil Eye- Found in Lower Guk?, 8 slots

Traveler's Backpack- found on Rathyl in Najena, need to get keys or
something to find him

Traveler's Pouch- found on Rathyl in Najena, can only hold small items

Traveler's Pack- reduces weight by 20%, 8 slots, sometimes reward for
Nillipus quest

Archaelogist's Pack- found on Goblin Archaelogist in Permafrost, 6 slots

Lionhide Backpack- found in South Karana? off of a rare spawn

Pierce's Pouch of Storing- reduces weight of items by 50-75%, 8 slots,
sometimes a reward from Nillipus
quest

If you know of anymore weight reduces packs, and have information on
where to get them, please let me
know...Any information about these items would be appreciated.

Also, where is the best place to find black pearls if I wanted to buy
them?
And info on the Serpent Skin Eyepatch would be appreciated...

Sorry so long,
All help is appreciated,

Grimlin
Level 16 Monk
Bristlebane server
